member.name: T:Percolator.Matching.ThresholdPercentage
member.summary: Thresholds for similarity passes for the "IsSimilar" function.

member.name: T:Percolator.Matching.Fuzzylator
member.summary: Percolator class for fuzzy string matching and scoring based on the Ratcliff/Obershelp algorithm.

member.name: M:Percolator.Matching.Fuzzylator.#ctor
member.summary: Empty paramater constructor sets the general threshold at 0.

member.name: M:Percolator.Matching.Fuzzylator.#ctor(Percolator.Matching.ThresholdPercentage)
member.summary: Sets the general threshold for matching.

member.name: M:Percolator.Matching.Fuzzylator.IsSimilar(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Takes the source and target and compares them, returning a true if the similarity meets or exceeds the minimum threshold.
member.param: The string to match.
The string to match against the source string.
"True" ignores case.

member.name: M:Percolator.Matching.Fuzzylator.IsSimilar(System.String,System.String,System.Double@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Takes the source and target and compares them, returning a true if the similarity meets or exceeds the minimum threshold.
member.param: The string to match.
The string to match against the source string.
Optional output parameter that outputs the score of the match if the match meets the threshold.
"True" ignores case.

member.name: M:Percolator.Matching.Fuzzylator.IsSimilar(System.String,System.String,Percolator.Matching.ThresholdPercentage,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Overloaded version which takes a specific alternate threshold.
member.param: The string to match.
The string to match against the source string.
"True" ignores case.
The temporary threshold for this function.

member.name: M:Percolator.Matching.Fuzzylator.IsSimilar(System.String,System.String,System.Double@,Percolator.Matching.ThresholdPercentage,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Overloaded version which takes a specific alternate threshold.
member.param: The string to match.
The string to match against the source string.
Optional output parameter that outputs the score of the match if the match meets the threshold.
"True" ignores case.
The temporary threshold for this function.

member.name: M:Percolator.Matching.Fuzzylator.IsUpcSimilar(System.String,System.String)
member.param: UPC string to match.
UPC string to match against the source.

member.name: M:Percolator.Matching.Fuzzylator.IsUpcSimilar(System.String,System.String,System.Double@)
member.param: UPC string to match.
UPC string to match against the source.
Optional output parameter that outputs the score of the match if the match meets the threshold.

member.name: M:Percolator.Matching.Fuzzylator.IsUpcSimilar(System.String,System.String,Percolator.Matching.ThresholdPercentage)
member.summary: Overloaded verion of IsUpcSimilar to include a temporary alternate threshold specific to this comparison.
member.param: UPC string to match.
UPC string to match against the source.
The alternate threshold put in place for this specific comparision.

member.name: M:Percolator.Matching.Fuzzylator.IsUpcSimilar(System.String,System.String,System.Double@,Percolator.Matching.ThresholdPercentage)
member.summary: Overloaded verion of IsUpcSimilar to include a temporary alternate threshold specific to this comparison.
member.param: UPC string to match.
UPC string to match against the source.
Optional output parameter to output the score if they do match.
The alternate threshold put in place for this specific comparision.

member.name: M:Percolator.Matching.Fuzzylator.GetUpcScore(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sepcific scoring for UPCs without longest common subtring.
member.param: The string to match.
The string to match against the source string.

member.name: M:Percolator.Matching.Fuzzylator.GetScore(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Used for scoring two strings on the similarity using Ratcliff/Obershelp algorithm.
member.param: String to match.
String to match against the source.
True to ignore case.

member.name: P:Percolator.Matching.Fuzzylator.Threshold
member.summary: Minimum threshold set for similarity passing.
